scrame.entity

Class Record

  • java.lang.Object
    • scrame.entity.Record
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Record
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Record is the class representing a class-student pair indicating that a student is enrolled in a class
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • calculateAverage

        private float calculateAverage(java.lang.String check)
        Return the average by calculating Mark based on Course weightage.
        Parameters:
        check - the parent name whose children tally need to be calculated
        Returns:
        the average of the parent's child based on course weightage
